comments.body: Relatedly, might be worth checking if `runfiles` contain `executable` as well. See https://groups.google.com/g/bazel-discuss/c/oEyEIr7vaF4/m/0E5QaK46AQAJ .
Thanks for the tip! Iâ€™ve added it in the runfiles depset as well.

+ def phase_default_info(ctx, p):

+         if hasattr(phase, "executable"):

+                 executable = phase.executable
